description: Isle of Man Bank said it was shutting bases in Peel and Castletown to "move with the times".
title: Isle of Man Bank to close two branches as more customers move online
title_page: Isle of Man Bank to close two branches as more customers move online - BBC News
maintext: A walk-in bank was a deciding factor for many firms and other branches were either too far away or "a nightmare to get into", he told the Local Democracy Reporting Service.
